introduction: SYNOPSISSeok-wu, an interior designer, meets a pretty woman, Hye-young. Their one night stand puts him in a trap. His wife and daughter begin to suffer from delusion of persecution and although Seok-wu, fearing for his family, tries to end it, things get messier. Hye-young fakes pregnancy to hold onto him and torments his wife Mi-kyung. Seok-wu, unable to stand it, confesses everything to his wife and ends things with Hye-young thus saving his family.故事30该隐seokwoo的内部是一个女人一天偶然相遇myoryeong hyeyoung一旦陷入爱情的陷阱，因为这件事的。因此seokwoo他的妻子和女儿都造成偏执，但它seokwoo由于担心家里hyeyoung遗憾的崩溃是给一个借口怀孕，并与seokwoo方法痛苦，gateun如何妻子显微镜。Seokwoo不能容忍是坦白一切，他的妻子，并立即恢复战斗接入hyeyoung后的和平，在家里。
